wiki.summary: Sauce It Up was first previewed on Lil Uzi Vert’s Instagram live on 6/21/2017. The song talks about how they are the life of the party and people that are trying to be like them are doing too much because they aren’t comparable in their eyes. This song brings out Uzi’s arrogance; claiming that they have “the sauce”. Since they have the sauce he feeling obligated to do what he wants, as they refer to this in the line “Sauce it Up, ayy Goin’ dumb, ayy goin’ nuts, ayy” Read more on Last.fm.
